title: Wilson's Tales of the Borders and of Scotland, Volume 04
author: Various
snippet: "Indeed, we're a'thegither lost in mist, and, for aught we ken, wemay be as auld as the Hunters o' Polmood, wha got a grant o' the twaHopes frae Malcolm Canmore.
